QuestData.Title: Once More Into The Fire
QuestData.Description: Fine, fine. You want a piece of the action? You can join in.$B$BLet me know when you're ready ta go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Cayden Dunwald through the somewhat obvious ambush.
QuestData.CompletionText: They keep comin an' I'll keep swinging!
QuestData.RewardText: A thing of beauty, isn't it? An' they keep comin' back for more. Love it!$B$BI'll go find Keely and settle her nerves in a bit. Just one more go through the row.

Objectives.Objective: Accompany Cayden through Dunwald Market Row
